Name: Armored Rhino Suit
desc: Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to Rhino, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard Armored Rhino Suit.

Name: Charge
desc: Forced Interrupt: When Rhino attacks, the attack gains overkill. At the end of this attack, discard Charge.

Name: Sonic Converter
desc: Forced Response: After Klaw attacks and damages a character, stun that character.

Name: Program Transmitter
desc: Forced Response: After Ultron schemes, place 1 threat on each side scheme.

Name: Upgraded Drones
desc: Each facedown Drone minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point.

Name: Vibranium Armor
desc: Forced Response: After the villain takes damage, give it a tough status card.

Name: Biomechnical Upgrades
desc: Forced Interrupt: When attached minion would be defeated, heal all damage from it instead, then discard this card.

Name: Hysteria
desc: Forced Interrupt: When Green Goblin schemes or attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for that activation.

Name: Pumpkin Bombs
desc: Forced Response: After the villain attacks you, discard Pumpkin Bombs and take 2 indirect damage.

Name: Pumpkin Bombs
desc: Forced Response: After the villain attacks you, discard Pumpkin Bombs and take 2 indirect damage.

Name: All Tied Up
desc: Attach to your identity card. Attached character cannot ready or change form.

Name: Media Coverage
desc: Attach to your identity card. Resolve each When Revealed ability that you reveal 1 additional time.

Name: Counterspell
desc: Attach to your hero. Forced Interrupt: When you play an event, cancel its effects and discard it. Then, discard this card.
